item.description:
Let's all practice in a fun and different environment--it's not a class and not a club!
Carlos & Anara will host an open salsa practices from 4:30-6:00 pm at the Community Art Center in Cambridge.

We will provide music, mirrors, hard wood floors, and a few fun, welcoming people to get the dancing started! There will be no organized instruction, so all participants should come ready to learn from and to help each other. COST: $5.

Special Bonus for Practice Participants !!

Meet-up Member DJ Rob Suave has generously offered discounted admission to Salsa Sundays at Ryles for all practice participants. When you arrive at the practice, you will simply sign-up on the list and pay $7, and then you can stroll into Ryles that night at any time you'd like! (Please note: sign up will only take place from 4:30-5:30 pm at CAC. Regular Admission to Sundays at Ryles is $10).

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston/Cambridge Salsa Meetup--CANCELLED DUE TO SNOW!
